file_intent: ETL pipeline for CSV transactions into aggregated reports

responsibility_blocks.description: Define in-memory data models for transactions and aggregated reports and provide CSV reading/line counting utilities
responsibility_blocks.label: CSV ingestion and transaction model

responsibility_blocks.description: Read a CSV file and yield strongly-typed Transaction objects; count input lines
responsibility_blocks.label: CSV reading and parsing

responsibility_blocks.description: Apply configurable filters to the transaction stream to narrow the dataset
responsibility_blocks.label: Transaction filtering

responsibility_blocks.description: Aggregate filtered transactions into totals, counts, and per-key breakdowns
responsibility_blocks.label: Aggregation of transactions

responsibility_blocks.description: Serialize the aggregated report to JSON and generate a human-readable summary file
responsibility_blocks.label: Report writing

responsibility_blocks.description: Coordinate reading, filtering, aggregating, and writing to produce final reports
responsibility_blocks.label: Pipeline orchestration

responsibility_blocks.description: Command-line interface to configure input, output, and filter options and run the pipeline
responsibility_blocks.label: CLI entrypoint and configuration
